name: Zombie Fighter:Battle Survival
description:
Your main objective is to survive from zombie invasion. There are undead zombies everywhere and nobody knows why people become living dead zombies after they died. Most of the survivors believe that Zombie Apocalypse started after a military scientific experiment. An incident caused deadly zombie virus, a biological weapon to spread all over the world before anti-virus founded. If you can’t survive and die, you will become a zombie, a member of undead zombie inferno army. Survive to find out the source of this mysterious epidemic zombie apocalypse and zombie invasion, Kill to survive and become a legendary zombie hunter survivor…

Features:
• Thrilling Action packed survival game with Commando mission!
• Make best strategy and become real survival hero!
• Variety of weapons and rifles to combat against enemies!
• High Quality 3d Graphics, Superb Animations & Best Sound Effects!
• Cool 3D graphics
• Exciting Missions
• Variety of Different Enemies
• Futuristic Destructive Weapons
• Addictive Gameplay
• A wide array of weapons
• Stunning Sound Effects
